Perceptor/Perceptor's team/Blacknightmare::

All things was almost done, just a thing should be solved. Perceptor 
opened his comm link "Perceptor to Blacknightmare, do you copy?"

"I'm Blacknightmare" said the femme while she stayed with ORchestra. 

"YOU'll stay in base with some bots in order to Protect the base... 
That's Darkfate's commands" said Perceptor.

"WHATT!!!???" shouted the femme.

"DON'T ARGUE!!!" Shouted Perceptor, before the femme could protest 
Perceptor close the comm link and left the base. 

"It's seem that I won't go, Orchestra..." said Blacknightmare, she 
added "YOu should follow them, Orchestra... It's your chance..."
